prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Piano, Organ, Brass, Guitar, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Piano, Organ, Brass, Guitar, and Bass, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Piano, Organ, Brass, Guitar, and Bass, but no Drums.

Style 3:
